name: Indukern
overview: Indukern, S.A. distributes chemical and fine chemical products in Europe, America, Asia Pacific, and Africa. The company focuses on agro, food, industrial products, export, pharmaceuticals, perfumery/cosmetics, and veterinary and feed. It offers agrochemicals products, which include herbicides, fungicide, post harvest, micro nutrients, and amino acids; essetial oils, acidifiers, anticaking, functional starches, amminoacids, antioxidants, preservatives, malt derivatives, dairy products, sweeteners, enzymes, phosphates, herbs and spices, flavour enhancers, mineral salts, and vitamins; inorganic and organic chemicals; filtration, adsorption, and absorption products; solvents solutions; and specialty chemicals. The company also provides analgesics, antianxiety, platelet aggregation inhibitor, anti-asthmatic, antibacterial, topical and systemical antibiotic, antidepressant, antiepileptic, antihypertensive, antihystaminics, anti-inflammatory, antineoplÃ¡sicos, antipsychotic, antiviral, corticosteroid, diuretics, antidiabetic, serum lipid reducing agent, immune modulator, immunosuppressant, mucolitics, calcium regulators, intestinal traffic regulators, and vasodilator. In addition, it offers glicerines, propylenglycols, and aroma chemicals; and antibiotics, anticoccidials, antioxidants, pet palatability enhancers, soya protein concentrates, enzymes, excipients and anticaking agents, minerals and oligoelements, pigments, and medicated premixes. The company was founded in 1962 and is based in Barcelona, Spain. It has locations in Bulgary, the Czech Republic, France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Poland, Portugal, Romania, the Russian Federation, Spain, Switzerland, Turkey, Ukraine, America, Brazil, Mexico, China, India, Syria, and Kenya.

offices.address2: Alta Ribagorza, 6-8, El Prat de Llobregat
